name: d1-auto-mirror-extended
description: Progressive database migration framework for moving from Cloudflare D1 to Postgres without downtime (Alpha Release)

scripts.validate: wrangler d1 list && echo 'Validation: Check that your D1 database ID matches wrangler.toml'
scripts.get-migration: echo 'Generate migration script: curl http://localhost:8787/migration-script > postgres-migration.sql'
